sp.KorselControl
Class KorselBluetoothSerial

java.lang.Object
  sp.KorselControl.KorselBluetoothSerial

public class KorselBluetoothSerial
extends java.lang.Object

Class representing the Korsel robot Connect, disconnect to/from robot sending steering commands to the Korsel and receiving the photo sensor state
